definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: They will charge you fifty dollars for a half-hour, and you won't be able to windsurf.
sentences.chinese: 他们半小时收费五十元，你根柢冲不起来。

sentences.english: Two and a half hours later, she emerges, dazed and emotional.
sentences.chinese: 两个半小时后，她昏昏沉沉地出现在我面前。

sentences.english: It was so simple – a half-an-hour meeting and everything was concluded.
sentences.chinese: 就这么简单，半小时的会面就解决了一切。

sentences.english: After they rode their bikes for two and a half hours, they arrived at the Ming Tombs.
sentences.chinese: 在他们骑车两个半小时后，他们到达了明陵。

sentences.english: Every human spent about half an hour as a single cell.
sentences.chinese: 每个人作为单细胞生存的时间约为半小时。

sentences.english: She can conjure up a good meal in half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 她能在半小时内变出一顿好餐。

sentences.english: Wang spent between half an hour and three hours on each painting.
sentences.chinese: 王月一幅画大概要花半小时到三个小时的时间不等。

sentences.english: Two astronauts spent six and a half hours unhooking a girder from the International Space Station.
sentences.chinese: 两名宇航员花了六个半小时解开国际空间站上地钢架。

sentences.english: In nearby Indore the ration is half an hour's supply every seven days.
sentences.chinese: 在邻近的印多尔则每7天才有一次半小时的供水。

sentences.english: Xu was arrested in the second half hour, Liu coming out of their own.
sentences.chinese: 就在许某被抓获后半小时，刘某自己现身了。

sentences.english: Just half an hour ago, Gigabyte sent its replacement strategy for all of its own motherboards.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅半小时前，技嘉送往自身所有的主板替换策略。

sentences.english: Half an hour after she woke up and began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 半小时后她醒过来而后开始哭了。

sentences.english: In something under half an hour there was a knock at the door.
sentences.chinese: 过了半小时不到一些，听到一下叩门声。

sentences.english: After half an hour later, as his arms out toilet.
sentences.chinese: 等饭后半小时后，把他抱出来上厕所。

sentences.english: Set your software timer to stop you every half hour or so.
sentences.chinese: 所以设置你的计时软件大约每半小时提醒你一次。

sentences.english: I watched for four and half hours no-stop.
sentences.chinese: 我一口气看了四个半小时。

definition: one week/all the way around/a whole cycle
a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
a moment/a while/in a moment/now...now.../also pr. [yi1 hui3 r5]
